import React, {Component} from 'react'; //import { Link } from "../routes.js"; import {Menu,Button,Header,Grid,Input} from "semantic-ui-react"; //import {Link} from "../routes"; import Blockchain from './Blockchain' import ShowLatestBlock from './ShowLatestBlock' class CreateBlockChain extends Component { state = { blockchain:new Blockchain(), data : new Array(30) } /*getting initial props */ componentDidMount(){/* axios.get('existBlockchain') .then(result =>{ console.log('El servidor responde que la blockchain (existe/no existe):(true/false)',result); const createdBlockchainInstance=result.data.createdBlockchainInstance; this.setState({createdBlockchainInstance}); }).catch(error =>{ console.log('error trying to get the blckchain instance status',error); });*/ } createBlockchain = () => { const newTx = this.state.data; const t1 = { "amount1":newTx[0], "sender1":newTx[1], "recipient1":newTx[2], "value41":newTx[3], "value51":newTx[4], } const t2 = { "amount2":newTx[5], "sender2":newTx[6], "recipient2":newTx[7], "value42":newTx[8], "value52":newTx[9], } const t3 = { "amount3":newTx[10], "sender3":newTx[11], "recipient3":newTx[12], "value43":newTx[13], "value53":newTx[14], } const t4 = { "amount4":newTx[15], "sender4":newTx[16], "recipient4":newTx[17], "value44":newTx[18], "value54":newTx[19], } const t5 = { "amount5":newTx[20], "sender5":newTx[21], "recipient5":newTx[22], "value45":newTx[23], "value55":newTx[24], } const t6 = { "amount6":newTx[25], "sender6":newTx[26], "recipient6":newTx[27], "value46":newTx[28], "value56":newTx[29] } const t = [t1,t2,t3,t4,t5,t6] const lastBlock = this.state.blockchain.createFirstBlockHandler(t) this.setState({lastBlock}) } setData = (order,e) => { console.log(this.state.data); let data = this.state.data; const value = e.target.value; data[order]=value; this.setState({data}); } receiveTxHandler = () => { const lastBlock = this.state.lastBlock if(!lastBlock){ return

DataSet 4:

DataSet 5:
 this.setData(20,e)} > this.setData(21,e)} > this.setData(22,e)} > this.setData(23,e)} > this.setData(24,e)} >
DataSet 6:
 this.setData(25,e)} > this.setData(26,e)} > this.setData(27,e)} > this.setData(28,e)} > this.setData(29,e)} >
} } showLatestBlock = () => { const lastBlock = this.state.lastBlock if(lastBlock){ return(
)
) } } render(){ return(
{this.receiveTxHandler()} {this.showLatestBlock()}
) } } export default CreateBlockChain; /* */
